name: Bad Shooter (underthree, rusus8, LazyCarp)
description:
Be sure to open the game in full screen! Otherwise, you may not see the button at level 7.
Bad Shooter

Play as Bob, his room's worst shooter.
His hands are shaky, in other words, they are unstable.
Bullets ricochet off walls and can kill you.

Controls

Press LMB to aim.
Release LMB to shoot.
E and Q switch hands

Write your results in the comments!
